title: Lenovo's new Yoga Book: almost a laptop
description: Two years after the original Yoga Book, Lenovo returns to IFA in Berlin with the much-improved second generation. Now with a bigger and better screen, beefier processor, and E Ink screen, the 2018 Yoga Book promises to be a great upgrade to one of the most unique devices on the market.
